title: Interactive Browser Demo
description: Browser-based interactive demo: split-pane UI with Monaco YAML editor and terminal emulator. Simulated commands (drift, validate-slo, deps, blast-radius, portfolio, lint) respond to YAML edits. Tech: React, Monaco, Tailwind, js-yaml. Zero install, instant load, educational. See INTERACTIVE_DEMO_SPEC.md for full specification.

comments.author: planning
comments.text: High priority: Creates compelling 'try it yourself' experience for potential users. Target: v0.3.0, ~2-3 days effort.
